Nunké arantukma átuk nuyá ayamruktatui. ― Guaranteeing and defending national sovereignty.
a preparation of tobacco juice used by a Shuar uwishín. It is taken orally or inhaled through the nose.
A shrunken head made by the Shuar and related people of South America.
a member of a Shuar tribal society who performs the role of a medical doctor and acts as a medium between the physical world and the spiritual world; shaman
